channel.title: Product Operations on Contested Thesis
channel.description: Recent content in Product Operations on Contested Thesis

item.title: Bootstrapping Product Operations
item.description: Recently I’ve been very hard at work creating a Product Operations function at Tanium from scratch. It’s been a bit of a wild ride and I’m not sure that I’ve really got it figured out yet, here are some briefly collected thoughts. The lay of the land Tanium is an enterprise software company selling “Converged Endpoint Management” which means that with one agent we can help the IT operations team, the security team, and the risk management team.
